Media processing backend: CA can only generate thumbnail page images for display if `Ghostscript <http://pages.cs.wisc.edu/~ghost/>`_ is installed on your system. Can extract text from file for searchability if `xPDF <http://www.foolabs.com/xpdf/download.html>`_ is installed.

Comments: CA can only generate thumbnail page images for display if `Ghostscript <http://pages.cs.wisc.edu/~ghost/>`_ is installed on your system.
Both .doc (< 2007 file format) and .docx (XML-based format) are supported. Can generate page previews and extract text from file for searchability if LibreOffice is installed.
